name: YelpRecord
description: An app where you can create posts about your local record shops,rate them, comment on them. NodeJS/Express/MongoDB

name: reQuest
description: An app uses virtual currency karma points to get help from other people or give help and receive karma points. Rails/React/PostgreSQL

name: Daily News Sense Client
description: Client Side of a news web app. Geolocation, UI language selection, Stripe payment features are used in this project. Rails/React/PostgreSQL

name: Daily News Sense Editorial
description: Editorial admin web app for controlling Daily News Sense. Journalist and Editors have different privilages. Rails/React/PostgreSQL

name: Cooper Test
description: A cooper test tracker for your own performance working with Rails API backend, Chart.js is used for drawing up nice performance graphs. Rails/React/PostgreSQL

name: InstaFood
description: A restaurant app where you can order food online, Rails API backend is used to handle users and orders. Rails/React/PostgreSQL

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A classical RPS game where you can activate cheat, enter your name and reset or save your score. Only ReactJs

name: Library
description: A virtual library living in Ruby,It has 32 books which you can checkout and return but never read. Only Ruby

name: ATM Machine
description: An ATM in Ruby,lets you open an account,withdraw,deposit money which you actually don't have. Only Ruby

name: BMI Calculator
description: A BMI calculator where you can measure how many Big Macs you had.‏‏‎ Only ReactJs‎‎‎‎

name: Address Book
description: An address book in Javascript, you can save your Friends's info,edit,delete them (if you have any). Javascript/JQuery

name: Kermit Homepage
description: You can learn about Kermit and purchase merchandise (at least you can try to). Basic HTML/CSS
